title: The power of LinkedIn’s 500 million member community
description: We recently crossed an important and exciting milestone. We now have half a billion members in 200 countries connecting, and engaging with one another in professional conversations and finding opportunities through these connections on LinkedIn.

title: Celebrate Earth: Sustainability at LinkedIn
description: We believe that how we work is just as important as what we do in creating economic opportunity for every member of the global workforce. It’s important for us to keep sustainable business practices top-of-mind when we think about our corporate social responsibility, and we're committed to do our part to reduce the carbon footprint.

title: LinkedIn data shows the most promising jobs in the healthcare, finance, and software and IT industries
description: We analyzed LinkedIn data to find the Most Promising Jobs in the healthcare, finance and software & IT industries. To create these lists, we looked at the careers on LinkedIn with high median salaries, healthy job openings and year-over-year growth, and the jobs most likely to lead to a promotion or advancement within an organization.

title: Introducing audience demographics: see who you're reaching when you post content on LinkedIn
description: Millions of professionals come to LinkedIn every day to share news, ideas, and perspectives. Posting to the LinkedIn feed provides a gateway to meaningful conversations with the people that matter most to your career. Today, we’re rolling out new insights on mobile to make it easier for you to understand who is seeing your posts on the world’s largest professional network.

title: More than 100 million professionals in Asia Pacific now connected on LinkedIn
description: SINGAPORE — August 10, 2016 — LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the world’s largest professional network today celebrated crossing the 100-million member mark in the Asia Pacific region (APAC), a doubling of its member base in two years. The region now represents 22 percent of LinkedIn’s global member base of over 450 million.

title: LinkedIn's first data centre outside of the U.S. comes online in Singapore
description: SINGAPORE, April 6, 2016 – LinkedIn (NYSE:LNKD), the world’s largest professional network with more than 414 million members globally, today unveiled its first data centre outside of the US, in Singapore. The new data centre, spanning 23,500 square feet in Jurong, is one of six data centres for LinkedIn globally. LinkedIn has invested SGD $80 million so far in the new data centre, which was established to enhance the experience for the fast-growing base of LinkedIn members and clients across the Asia Pacific region, including speed and reliability of access to LinkedIn’s services as they connect to professional opportunities on the network.
